mapper.select: SELECT STDR_DT , ( SELECT MAX(V.STDR_DT) AS MX_DT FROM IBIMS991B V WHERE 1=1 AND V.STDR_DT < A.STDR_DT AND V.HOLIDAY = 0 AND V.STDR_DT BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(A.STDR_DT,'YYYYMMDD'), -1),'YYYYMMDD') AND A.STDR_DT ) AS BF_DT , ( SELECT MIN(V.STDR_DT) AS MX_DT FROM IBIMS991B V WHERE 1=1 AND V.STDR_DT > A.STDR_DT AND V.HOLIDAY = 0 AND V.STDR_DT BETWEEN A.STDR_DT AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(A.STDR_DT,'YYYYMMDD'), 1),'YYYYMMDD') ) AS AF_DT , DAYOFWEEKS , HOLIDAY , CONTENT FROM IBIMS991B A WHERE 1=1 AND STDR_DT = #{stdrDt}
